author: karl
msg: * Move aclocal.m4 to acinclude.m4 -- we need the aclocal command
to generate acinclude.m4 based on aclocal.m4 and stuff it gleans
* configure: check in configure script, it's hard to make unless
you have everything just right.  We will probably revisit this
* libtool:  Added libtool and friends in tclconfig dir using
libtoolize -- this is what figures out how to build shared

author: karl
msg: Propagate NAMEOFEXECUTABLE into the build via the configure script, etc.
Remove --with-tclsh option.  TEA figures it out for us from tclConfig.sh.

author: karl
msg: Substitute more apxs-derived variables.  Prettify the output of the configure

author: karl
msg: Have sorted out most of the libtool, autoconf, automake, aclocal, etc,

author: karl
msg: GNU aclocal 1.9, autoconf 2.59, and automake 1.9 can now be used and
all the helper scripts and stuff seem to be there.
